version_description:
◉ Speed improvements.
◉ x6 alternative and harder path, where you can get x6 points!
◉ New Mini Transformation.
◉ Jump over the river!

If you like the game and want to support us, please write or update your review on the AppStore! Thank you very much.

Enjoy the game. Take a break, if needed.

Follow The Line on Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/theline_game

◉ 2048 Skin.

◉ White Tile Skin.

◉ Achievements are now available. You can see the list of achievements via the LEADERBOARD.
